description.value: At 8th level, any creature you are grappling or pinning is affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.snspotd2cno49ed5]{Zone of Truth} (Will negates). Outside of combat, you may use this ability by touching a target with both hands. You can use this ability a number of rounds per day equal to your inquisitor level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. The effect ends if you stop grappling, pinning, or touching the target.
